TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 335

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin and George Sutherland, February 19, 1830. Agreement concerning settlement of 10 families. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 335

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin and George Sutherland, February 19, 1830. Agreement concerning settlement of 10 families. (Omitted.)*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[Agreement, February 19, 1830: Sutherland to introduce 10 families and Austin to receive them as colonists and grant land to them for the usual fees.]*/p*
*/div1*
